verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is not <S%H1361>haughty<s%>, nor mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7311>lofty<s%>: neither do I <S%H1980>exercise<s%> myself in great <S%H1419>matters<s%>, or in things too <S%H6381>high<s%> for me.

Surely I have <S%H7737>behaved<s%> and <S%H1826>quieted<s%> <S%H5315>myself<s%>, as a child that is <S%H1580>weaned<s%> of his <S%H517>mother<s%>: my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is even as a weaned <S%H1580>child<s%>.
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3176>hope<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from henceforth and <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
